questions.question: Liquids with high molecular masses have ....... viscosity.

explanations.a: Liquids with high molecular masses usually have stronger intermolecular forces, which increases resistance to flow.
explanations.b: Viscosity differs based on molecular structure; it's not necessarily equal.
explanations.c: Correct. Higher molecular mass often correlates with greater viscosity.
explanations.d: Viscosity is rarely zero for liquids.

questions.question: While determining the viscosity of a liquid with the help of a viscometer, the liquid was sucked with great difficulty. The liquid may be.......

explanations.a: Correct. Glycerin is highly viscous and resists flow.
explanations.b: Ethanol is less viscous and flows more easily.
